mapper.select: SELECT w.userCode, couponName, couponPrice, TO_CHAR(c.startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(c.endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS endDate FROM winner w LEFT OUTER JOIN event e ON w.eventNum = e.eventNum LEFT OUTER JOIN coupon c ON c.eventNum = e.eventNum WHERE w.userCode = #{userCode}
